titles: The mariage night written by the Lord Viscount Fawlkland.
author: Falkland, Henry Cary, Viscount, 1634-1663.
publisher: Printed by W.G. for R. Crofts ...,
notes: Written by Henry Cary, 4th Viscount Falkland; title cited in Burke's as The marriage night.  Cf. Burke's peerage, 1970, p. 981.
